question: What  is  d & d ? ?
answer:
D&D stands for dungeon and dragons which is a fantasy tabletop game where you and your friends just .. well. Imagine story telling, weird adventures, a lot of teamwork, messing around, killing things, social encounters and a bunch of fun and acting basically.


I used to be extremely skeptical about d&d- until i watched this show called critical role on youtube, and until my friends basically dragged me into a session. And i had a blast!

blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

blog.name: mrandmrsvex
blog.title: Mr. and Mrs. Vex, to be fair
blog.description:
Critical role fanblog in general, major Perc'ahlia trash in particular.  basically I just have a lot of feelings for Vox Machina and I want to scream them all at you.

THINGS THAT ARE TOTALLY COOL TO DO:
- reblogging any of my posts, screenshots and writing
- adding commentary to anything, or your own headcanons, or whatever
- shooting me a message with any random thing you wanna tell me, questions, writing prompts, I love it all
(if I don't react to a reblog/added comment/tags then sorry! My tumblr is really broken and I often don't see it for days. I DO TRY TO READ ALL TAGS ON REBLOGS OF MY POSTS THOUGH cause I love them. a lot.)

question: 46: “You changed.”
answer:
Dying hurts. Dying really fucking hurts, Beau thinks to herself as she’s lying on the cool ground, eyes shut tight. The ground was scorching hot when she hit it, still simmering from Caleb’s fire, before everything went black. Now it’s cold. Frozen cold. And so is she.

Her chest still hurts, and it’s hard to breathe, and she refuses to open her eyes, to see where she ended up, now that she-

she knows she’s dead. Strange, how you instantly know. But that doesn’t mean she has to admit it, or accept it, or look-

something is poking her arm.

Ignore it. She thinks, but the poking continues, until a distant, yet very familiar voice breaks through the silence.


„Are you gonna ignore me until I punch you? Really? I thought we’d grown past that.“


Her eyes flicker open, almost involuntarily, and are met with a sea of gold and purple and silver. With horns and jewelry and curls and red eyes and a grin, a sad grin, much sadder than she ever remembered. She sits up straight, staring at him, Molly, is all she can think before she flings her arms around him and pulls him in tight. He’s as cold as the ground. As cold as she is.


„Well, that’s new.“ He’s still grinning as she lets go, but his voice is wavering. „I was expecting far more insults and yelling.“


„I’m not gonna yell insults at you right after meeting you in the afterlife, you asshole.“


He laughs, and Beau’s chest hurts. She remembers that laugh. She missed it.


„Ah, there’s the pissy monk I know and love to hate! Don’t worry though.“ Molly sits back on crossed legs. „This isn’t the afterlife, or whatever you’d call it. And you’re not gonna stay long anyway. Otherwise the big lady would’ve sent you a competent helper, not me.“


„What is it, then, wise guy.“


He shrugs. „Limbo? It’s hard to explain. But you don’t need to understand that yet. I’m sure Jester is already trying to get you back. You got the diamonds for that now, I hope?“


Beau swallows. They do, they have diamonds now, and everything else they need for a quick resurrection, luckily. Not like back when… she only nods.


„Well then, I think we don’t have long. So.“ Molly leans forward, still smiling at her, and she wants to smile back. She wants to.

„Gimme a quick update. What’s happening with you guys? What shit have you gotten into that got you… here?“


It’s difficult at first, awkward almost, to tell her old companion about all the things they’ve been up to ever since…. since they lost him. But soon enough the words keep tumbling out of her mouth before she can think. Stories about Nott, how much she’s warmed up to everyone, how confident she is now. How much Caleb is willing to work with the group now, how he’s opening up more and more. How much Jester has learned, and how little her joy and energy has changed, despite what the world has thrown at her. How much Fjord has changed, how much they’ve learnt about him. Everything about Yasha, despite her being, well, gone almost as much as Molly himself. She talks and talks and barely notices his smile changing, the sadness now finally gone.


„Wow, sounds like the group is actually growing for the better. I was expecting far more disaster.“


Now it’s her turn to smile sadly. „Like I’m going to tell you about all of our shit moments when we get, like, maybe one chance to catch up. Trust me, there’s been plenty. We manage, though.“


He nods. „And what about you?“


„I’m still just me.“


„Nope.“ The jewelry jingles as he shakes his head. „Not believing that bullshit. You changed. I can tell. And I’m glad.“


Beau’s smile is still sad, even as she feels the warmth slowly growing through her limbs, crawling across her skin right into her heart. She’s almost gone back, and she can see in Molly’s eyes that he knows, too, but there is still enough time for an answer.


„Well. You did leave everything better than when you found it, I guess.“

summary: The Raven’s Martyr- A Critical Role Playlist, Vax
title: The Raven’s Martyr- A Critical Role Playlist, Vax
body:
For the reckless, ridiculous, loyal rouge with his heart on his sleeve. One of my favorites from the first few episodes. More and more keeps getting added so check back every now and then. Song list and reasoning below the cut. Live to spite those who want you to die and die to save those who helped you to live. 

The Raven’s Martyr- A Critical Role Playlist, Vax

Playlist Masterlist

Title: yeah…..

  • Champion– Vax’s character song, the one that defines him for me
  • Icarus– “Icarus is flying toward an early grave”
  • these are my friends– “these are my friends, I love them, I love them”
  • All My Friends– (yes these are different songs) those lyrics are pretty spot on
  • home– found family (I want you to compare this song to the song at the end list far from home)
  • Shameless– the twins
  • Youngblood– daddy issues
  • Evelyn Evelyn– the twins pre stream
  • Saint Elizabeth– Keyleth
  • Movement-- “you know I’m in love with you right?”
  • Like The Dawn– do we have enough Keyleth songs?
  • Every Step That I Take– Idk seemed right?
  • Hot Blood– a fight song
  • Listost-- Gilmore
  • Hold on for Your Life– the sunken tomb
  • Birds of a Feather– the Queen and her Champion
  • Losing My Religion– trying to figure out your new divine charge
  • Letters Home–writing letters in between missions, just in case 
  • You gotta die sometime-- A few good lyrics in there, a maybe
  • This Will End–” Cause I’m not afraid to die”
  • Pray– lyrics man (also Logic is on there)
  • Blackbird Song– “blackbird’s song is over now”
  • Slow Farewell– Only a temporary return
  • Pale White Horse– I always pictured this song as the tower is falling at the end. 
  • Far From Home– “I’m sending a raven…” I’m not crying you’re crying
  • Where Is Your Rider– “but these bones never rested while living, how can they stand to languish in repose” ok so this is based on my opinion that Vax became some sort of spirit/ mythological figure after everything.
body_abstract:
For the reckless, ridiculous, loyal rouge with his heart on his sleeve. One of my favorites from the first few episodes. More and more keeps getting added so check back every now and then. Song list and reasoning below the cut. Live to spite those who want you to die and die to save those who helped you to live.

summary: Was inspired by the recent everythingiscontent and drew a simple Beau. This is also my first critical role fan art I've drawn,...
body: Was inspired by the recent everythingiscontent and drew a simple Beau. This is also my first critical role fan art I’ve drawn, which is crazy considering how super into the show I’ve been for several years now.

blog.name: kami-catharsis
blog.title: Moo
blog.description: aaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH, hi

summary:
FANFIC WHERE ITS LIKE THE SIX SENSE OR SOMETHING WITH MOLLY
Like he’s there (alive) with the mighty nein all the way up until...
body:
FANFIC WHERE ITS LIKE THE SIX SENSE OR SOMETHING WITH MOLLY

Like he’s there (alive) with the mighty nein all the way up until the fight with Fuck-off #1 where Molly would have died

And then, it’s after the fight, all of them don’t recall what happened right when Molly died, they all seem to have just spaced out or fainted or something.

Anyway The Badies got away and Molly’s standing there like “come on, let’s get moving, we should find a place to stay the night”

And yeah, they continue on their adventures but none of them really notice Molly eating or drinking, or lack of in that case. Every time they stealth he seems to have rolled a natural 20 because he’s never noticed.

When they meet Caduceus, he makes distressed cow noises and casts something

I really can’t think much more up but I WOULD LOVE TO READ THIS PLZ

summary: Im going to be freaking out till thursday because next ep is 44. Campaign 1 was Sunken Tomb... C2 they’re going into a Sunken...
body:
Im going to be freaking out till thursday because next ep is 44. Campaign 1 was Sunken Tomb…

C2 they’re going into a Sunken Ship….

no one touch anything. no touching strange armor without checking for magic traps first please. NO CLERICS TOUCHING THINGS WITH OUT THINKING (JESTER. remember your past life who is still alive)

Think about that song 

I am going to try not to bite my nails from being so nervous…..
